title: ERA2021-P01-Raycasting-mit-Festkommazahlen
problemStatement:
### **Achtung**:
Aus technischen und organisatorischen Gründen können Complaints ab jetzt nur noch postalisch eingereicht werden.
Anfragen per Mail werden nicht beantwortet!
Anschrift:
Dr. Martin Schreiber
Technical University of Munich
Informatics 10: Computer Architecture and Parallel Systems
Boltzmannstrasse 3, Room 1.4.38
85748 Garching, Germany

1. [task][Erfolgreiches Kompilieren](Compile) Die Aufgabe muss kompilieren um korrigiert und bewertet zu werden! **Alle notwendigen Informationen zu dieser Aufgabe finden Sie auf dem auf Moodle bereitgestellten Blatt.** Die Korrekturinformationen zu dieser Projektaufgabe [finden sich auf Moodle.](https://www.moodle.tum.de/pluginfile.php/2641956/mod_label/intro/P1_korrekturinfos_studis.pdf)

cp -f tests/Makefile_example assignment/example_program/Makefile || exit 2","name":"prepare_makefile","runAlways":false},{"script":"cd tests

","name":"run_and_compile","runAlways":false},{"script":"#empty script action, just for the results","name":"junit","results":[{"name":"junit_**/result.xml","path":"**/result.xml","type":"junit","before":true}],"runAlways":true}]}
buildConfig.buildScript:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -e
export AEOLUS_INITIAL_DIRECTORY=${PWD}
provide_environment_information () {
  echo '⚙️ executing provide_environment_information'
  #!/bin/bash

  echo "--------------------Python versions--------------------"
  python3 --version
  pip3 --version

  echo "--------------------Contents of tests repository--------------------"
  ls -la tests
  echo "---------------------------------------------"
  echo "--------------------Contents of assignment repository--------------------"
  ls -la assignment
  echo "---------------------------------------------"

  #Fallback in case Docker does not work as intended
  REQ_FILE=tests/requirements.txt
  if [ -f "$REQ_FILE" ]; then
      pip3 install --user -r tests/requirements.txt
  else
      echo "$REQ_FILE does not exist"
  fi

  exit 0

}

prepare_makefile () {
  echo '⚙️ executing prepare_makefile'
  #!/usr/bin/env bash

  rm -f assignment/{GNUmakefile, Makefile, makefile}
  rm -f assignment/tests/{GNUmakefile, Makefile, makefile}
  rm -f assignment/example_program/{GNUmakefile, Makefile, makefile}
  rm -f assignment/io.inc

  cp -f tests/Makefile_assignment assignment/Makefile || exit 2
  cp -f tests/Makefile_tests assignment/tests/Makefile
  cp -f tests/Makefile_example assignment/example_program/Makefile || exit 2
}

run_and_compile () {
  echo '⚙️ executing run_and_compile'
  cd tests

  python3 compileTest.py ../assignment/
  rm compileTest.py
  cp result.xml ../assignment/result.xml

  exit 0

}

junit () {
  echo '⚙️ executing junit'
  #empty script action, just for the results
}

final_aeolus_post_action () {
  set +e # from now on, we don't exit on errors
  echo '⚙️ executing final_aeolus_post_action'
  cd "${AEOLUS_INITIAL_DIRECTORY}"
  junit
}

main () {
  if [[ "${1}" == "aeolus_sourcing" ]]; then
    return 0 # just source to use the methods in the subshell, no execution
  fi
  local _script_name
  _script_name=${BASH_SOURCE[0]:-$0}
  trap final_aeolus_post_action EXIT

  cd "${AEOLUS_INITIAL_DIRECTORY}"
  bash -c "source ${_script_name} aeolus_sourcing; provide_environment_information"
  cd "${AEOLUS_INITIAL_DIRECTORY}"
  bash -c "source ${_script_name} aeolus_sourcing; prepare_makefile"
  cd "${AEOLUS_INITIAL_DIRECTORY}"
  bash -c "source ${_script_name} aeolus_sourcing; run_and_compile"
}

main "${@}"

actions.name: provide_environment_information
actions.script:
#!/bin/bash

echo "--------------------Python versions--------------------"
python3 --version
pip3 --version

echo "--------------------Contents of tests repository--------------------"
ls -la tests
echo "---------------------------------------------"
echo "--------------------Contents of assignment repository--------------------"
ls -la assignment
echo "---------------------------------------------"

#Fallback in case Docker does not work as intended
REQ_FILE=tests/requirements.txt
if [ -f "$REQ_FILE" ]; then
    pip3 install --user -r tests/requirements.txt
else
    echo "$REQ_FILE does not exist"
fi

exit 0

actions.name: prepare_makefile
run_and_compile
actions.script:
cd tests

python3 compileTest.py ../assignment/
rm compileTest.py
cp result.xml ../assignment/result.xml

exit 0

actions.name: junit
actions.script: #empty script action, just for the results
